column5: What a beautiful day on the lake that's all I can say. The lake was as flat as glass, running from Dover to Nanticoke was no trouble for us at all. My dad and my nephew Isaiah had a great day out there. Silver bass were unlimited, we kept about 40 and started releasing the rest. Smallies were biting too. It was Isaiah's greatest day of fishing yet, he had a blast and so did I. Jigging spoons, grubs and yes the old faithful worm for Isaiah were the hot baits.  Don't get too many awesome days like that on the big lake!
Hi rich. my dad and me are heading out to nanticoke sometime this week. are the  silvers at the electricity plant in the warm water discharge ok to eat ?  thanks
Glad you had a great day and the smiles say it all.
Man is your nephew happy .Thanks for the pics.  MTP
Great report Rich-congrats & good to see the young fella had a blast.
great photo of the little guy
Great stuff Rich, fishing with kids always ends up with great pictures.
